title: FIX YOUR F'ING GAME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: I CANT PLAY FOR SHIT,  MY GAME KEEPS CRASHING AFTER CHAMP SELECT AND SAYING I GOT A BUG SPLAT, NEVER HAD THIS PROBLEM BEFORE AND NOW I HAVE A 20 MIN PENALTY FROM LEAVEBUSTER. THIS GAME MADE ME SCREW UP MY COMPUTERS SCALING AND RESOLUTION ONLY TO FIND OUT I CANT PLAY FOR SHIT. FIX THIS PLEASE. MY DRIVERS ARE ALL UPDATED THERE IS NOTHING WRONG WITH MY COMPUTER.

replies.body:
This is not a normal issue with league, therefor it is a local issue with your computer/installation. Considering the tone of this post, you are not going to accept that and have no idea what to do about it anyway..

Have you tried fixing your broken computer?

Sounds like you have a bad infection of windows 10, which is a kind of virus. Plus probably not running the game as admin.

this actually has been a regular client issue as of recently. Many people have been experiencing client crashes in champ select, the main menu and the the loading screen, it has happened to me a few times. I wouldn't say this is an issue with his computer.

well then it would seem you have something corrupt on your pc cuz if you disconnect a component and it runs but dont run well id look at that component... im not an IT guy but i do drive ability for auto tech and its alot of modules , software, data comm etc

No, I think it is a problem with League. The same thing happened to me a couple of weeks ago. Four bug splats within a 5 minute period. Reconnect to game, bug splat at 32% loading. Got the leaverbuster and couldn't play. Repaired the client two times and it still happened. My drivers are all updated as well and it had never happened to me before. I contacted Riot via support ticket and they STILL left the leaverbuster on my record because "it created a negative environment for all players" despite me telling my team I was having problems, they were all invisible in the game, including myself and I could not buy. I even told them I was reconnecting and they still did a remake. Not any of my fault and yet I am still to blame? I'm sure my team wasn't nearly as frustrated as me.
